directions: Arrange cantaloupe, salami, and Parmesan cheese on a platter. Sprinkle arugula over cantaloupe mixture; season with salt and pepper. Drizzle olive oil and lime juice over salad.
ingredients: 1/2 cantaloupe - peeled, seeded, and thinly sliced into strips
1/4 pound thinly sliced spicy salami, cut into strips
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Cantaloupe with Salami Salad
